replies.body:
False.

Veigar makes no demands for surrender; murder is the best solution.
Why does this look familiar? I swear I've seen him before, but I can't place it...
from that one episode of My Life as a Teenage Robot

Ah, that explains it. Man, I haven't thought about that show in so many years.
 Well shit, now I feel old.

> [{quoted}](name=Hollow Miracles,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=A2ZEqN7A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-21T16:14:38.998+0000)
>
> Why does this look familiar? I swear I've seen him before, but I can't place it...

My Life as a Teenage Robot. He's a little wind-up toy that's evil, and he's really funny. I miss that show. :(
I remember that show. It was funny.

then he one shots you and you are like
https://31.media.tumblr.com/ffbee81cc672c10845b3b097c2b63477/tumblr_inline_nispifgIzx1ss27h4.gif
I remember that shit and it seems about right.
{{champion:86}} WHAT WAS THAT?! WHERE! SHOW IT TO ME!!!

My life as a teenage robot!!! :OOO 



That is my fav nick show!!! :DDD
